[Page Title: Bourbon N' Bubbles - Charleston, SC]

× 
Reserve your table today!

Open at 4pm daily.

We recommend making a reservation ahead of time. Book your table today!
Book Table × 
Host your next party or get together with us!
Call to Inquire 
570 King Street, Charleston, SC 29403
map marker pin Welcome to Bourbon and Bubbles! 
Charleston's Destination for Elevated Dining and Spirits*Featured in Whiskey Advocate, December 2025*

Located in the heart of Upper King, Bourbon N’ Bubbles blends modern luxury with Southern warmth. Our menu features chef-crafted appetizers and shared plates designed for connection, perfectly paired with a curated selection of fine bourbons, Champagne, and signature cocktails.

Whether you’re joining us for dinner, a celebration, or a late-night toast, Bourbon N’ Bubbles invites you to indulge in Charleston’s most stylish dining experience.
Our menu food menu Events 
Host Your Celebration at Bourbon N’ Bubbles!

From private dinners to milestone celebrations, our elegant setting and elevated menu make every event unforgettable. Let our team craft an experience your guests will rave about.
Book Your Event Cocktails 
Experience the Art of the Pour Our cocktails are as bold and refined as our name — handcrafted classics, innovative creations, and the city’s finest selection of bourbon and bubbles.
Explore the menu drink menu 
Reservations

Join us today

*
Book here 
Reviews

review by - Yelp

Tiffany P:

Visiting Charleston and stumbled upon a gem. Not only is the food and drinks good, our server Maggie Leaf was amazing! She provided great recommendations for our food selection and also provided suggestions on what we could do on our visit. Good food, good vibes, good service. Definitely a go-to spot.

review by - Yelp

Cory L:

If you want a variation on drinks from the norm, this is the place to go. Sam and Maggie can get make sure your experience is beyond compare. The knowledge they have with Bourbon and Whiskey can ensure you are getting the right drink and experience compared to anyone in Charleston

review by - Yelp

Nina S:

Came here for a prefix dinner for a bachelorette party and it was perfect. The food was good and it was a fun atmosphere for the evening. Request MJ as your server. She was amazing! Made sure everyone always had a drink in hand and was having a great time!

review by - Yelp

Linda P:

What a great place! Atmosphere was awesome! Server Maggie Leaf was fantastic! Be sure to ask for her! We had the New Riff flight. Wow! Try the Chuck Norris and John Wick! Also tried the cocktails Je T'aime (4 Roses) and Love at First Sight (Tito's). Yum! Hummus for the appetizer was perfect. For dinner, we had the burger and the farmer's plate...

review by - Yelp

Steph Y:

We chose this place randomly for a girls weekend. The location is downtown and super easy to get to, with lots of other stores around. The choose of cocktails and bourbons was excellent, and the food was unique. Service was great. All in all, this is a place we'll return to when we're in Charleston.
